helpText.description: Query ERC-20 token balances for an Ethereum address using Etherscan API v2

options.apikey: Etherscan API key (required, can also be set via ETHERSCAN_API_KEY environment variable)

examples: Using only API key (uses default address)

errorMessages.apiKeyRequired: Error: API key is required. Use --apikey option or set ETHERSCAN_API_KEY environment variable.
errorMessages.invalidAddressFormat: Expected format: 0x followed by 40 hexadecimal characters
errorMessages.apiRequestFailed: Error: Failed to connect to Etherscan API
